dialogue: I've noticed a disturbing pattern in the assignments I give you.
You always say you will take care of something, but then you don't.
Then, when I question you about it, you say you really will take care of it.
So I'm here to tell you it isn't optional to do assignments.
You must do what I tell you to do.
I will totally take care of that.
Why doesn't this feel like a win?
